57040.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5qs61","text":"Obtain 1L LB Broth from the media kitchen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5dse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fma7t","text":"LB Broth contents: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btvk2","text":"4gNaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mb3u","text":"4 g Tryptone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rpqd","text":"2 g Yeast Extract dH2O to 400 mL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ap0r","text":"Obtain 2 x 2L sterile Erlenmeyer flask from the glassware room","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cmt0e","text":"In the microbial hood, add 500mL liquid LB to each flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f2n7","text":"Using a sterile pipette tip, select a single colony from your plate. Drop pipette tip into the flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2vp0b","text":"Re-cover the flask with the sterile aluminium foil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5oacq","text":"Incubate the bacterial cultures at the 37C 200rpm for 16-18 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nseh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"74kpn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6i980","text":"Transport inoculated cultures to and from incubator in plastic box labelled 'Dirty only'. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ug64","text":"After incubation, check for growth, which is characterized by a cloudy haze in the media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58aa8","text":"Measure the optical density of the overnight culture. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54m6s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"664t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dl8dn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ud0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0s3u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2scgk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fkhr6","text":"Pipette culture into cuvettes in the microbial hood as there is a risk of aerosol production. Use specified box to transport cuvettes to lab. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"","data":{"authors":[{"affiliation":"Imperial College London","affiliation_url":"http://behave.lms.mrc.ac.uk/","image":{"placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/86b3npn.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/86b3npn.jpg","webp_source":""},"is_verified_author":null,"is_verified_user":null,"link":"https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Priota_Islam","name":"Priota  Islam","note":null,"username":"priota-islam"}],"creator":{"name":"Priota Islam","username":"priota-islam"},"doi":"dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.vude6s6","doi_status":2,"fork_id":0,"guid":"FAB15F80779A11EC82CB05EE56A9E921","has_subprotocols":0,"id":18021,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null,"webp_source":null},"load_collapsed":false,"stats":null,"title":"Optical density measurement for Bacterial solution (Worm Food)","title_html":"Optical density measurement for Bacterial solution (Worm Food)","type_id":1,"uri":"optical-density-measurement-for-bacterial-solution-vude6s6","version_data":{"code":"vude6s6","has_approved_merge_request":false,"has_pending_merge_request":false,"id":0,"is_parent_public":false,"is_same_owner":false,"merge_request":null,"parent_id":null,"parent_uri":null,"version_class":18021}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80ep0","text":"Streak OP50 onto LB Agar and grow overnight at 37C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd62m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djbjf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k7si","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"m9r8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jn1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"","data":{"authors":[{"affiliation":"Imperial College {"blocks":[{"key":"cr0at","text":"Obtain 100mL LB Agar from the media kitchen. Heat in the microwave in 20s bursts until liquid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"801op","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e55k2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6948k","text":"Label 2 x 90mm Petri dishes with 'LB Agar' and the date. Using a stripette, dispense 35mL LB agar into each of them. Leave to set on bench. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hml7","text":"The next day, check for individual colonies on OP50 plate. Parafilm the plate and store in 4C fridge for up to a month. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mjct","text":"Adjust OD600 of the culture to 1.0 using LB. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3afu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9n6r","text":"Amount of LB (mL) to add = (OD600 x 500mL) - 500mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ekq8k","text":"Aliquot culture into 50mL Falcon tubes and store in 4C fridge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hn8p","text":"Paraformaldehyde (PFA), a polymer of formaldehyde, is an organic solution that permeabilizes bacterial cells making them no longer viable/metabolically active. However, PFA does not cause the lysis of inner cell structure, meaning the bacteria are still edible for the worms. Adapted from Beydoun et al. 2021. ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":297,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2l9r7","text":"Follow steps 1 to 12","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"corfm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5jt8i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":57040,"title":"Growing overnight culture of OP50 as worm food","title_html":"\u003cp\u003eGrowing overnight culture of OP50 as worm food\u003c/p\u003e","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"growing-overnight-culture-of-op50-as-worm-food-b3xqqpmw","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Bonnie Evans","affiliation":null,"affiliation_url":null,"username":"bonnie-evans","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/013.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/013.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":14},"type_id":1,"guid":"672050BB779911ECB1480A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sdq7","text":"In the fume hood, add 16% PFA stock to the culture to give a 0.5% concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ef23","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1105v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14btk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e716s","text":"If a spill occurs within the fume hood, the spill can be considered minor and can be cleaned up using paper towels. Clean any contaminated surface with cold water at least two times. Place the contaminated paper towels into a sealable bag for disposal as hazardous waste.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"q3i2","text":"Divide culture into an even number of 50mL Falcons with equal volume ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u2gf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hcpg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84g68","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2jn9m","text":"It is important to use sterile technique to prevent the introduction of live bacteria into the culture","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecv3c","text":"Pour off supernatant into a waste flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lpq8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5a9um","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"det9l","text":"Treat with Virkon when finished","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ni1k","text":"Using a stripette, replace with an equal volume of M9 and re-suspend pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lite","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lllc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emo15","text":"Vortex Falcons to fully re-suspend pellet and combine solutions in a larger container (should be the same total volume as the original culture). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s0kh","text":"Using an inoculation loop, streak the PFA-treated culture on LB agar and incubate overnight at 37C to check for contamination/live bacteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhgvq","text":"Once PFA killing has been confirmed as successful, aliquot into 50mL Falcons and store at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duasl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c5n2v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8j4uf","text":"Dispose via hazardous waste","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sa2","text":"In the fume hood, break off the head of the ampoule of 16% paraformaldehyde (PFA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hagi","text":"Using a plastic Pasteur pipette, decant the solution into a brown glass bottle. Dispose of Pasteur pipette in Biobin in fume hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d29vj","text":"Leave the ampoule on the plastic tray in the fume hood to allow any remaining PFA to evaporate. Dispose of in sharps bin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ie9c","text":"Store the PFA stock solution double contained at 4°C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: PFA treatment of OP50
